this post critically examines the idea that personal information is not being adequately protected in today's digital age. the use of the german language and the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphÃ¤re (privacy) suggest a focus on the issue within the context of germany and the wider global conversation. the tone is somewhat sarcastic, implying that people are not taking the time to properly consider the consequences of their actions when agreeing to terms and conditions regarding data privacy.
